Headline: No trains between Howard and Belmont
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Belmont due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Belmont due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating only between 95th and Belmont at this time.

Shuttle buses are available from Howard to Belmont to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to a medical emergency at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to a medical emergency at Howard.

Shuttle buses are available from Howard to Skokie to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines. Consider using the #97 Skokie bus for alternate service,

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Howard and Linden
ShortDescription: Purple Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Linden due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Linden due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

Shuttle buses have been requested from Howard to Linden to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
